birthday_form.change_description: Edit or delete the selected birthday. The new data will be displayed on the home page or under "My Birthdays" after the successful update or deletion.
birthday_form.create_description: Create a new Birthday. After successful creation, this will be displayed on the home page or under "My Birthdays".

file_uploader.title: File uploader
file_uploader.description_one: Drag the file into the field or click the field to add the file
file_uploader.description_other: Drag the files into the field or click the field to add the files
file_uploader.to_many_files_one: A maximum of one file is allowed
file_uploader.to_many_files_other: A maximum of {{count}} files are allowed
file_uploader.to_few_files: There must be at least one file
